Charlotte MI Job Search Tip
Charlotte is a city on the move and can attribute its economic success to six specific industries: banking/finance, information services, tourism, software, travel and distribution and manufacturing. Charlotte is second only to New York City in regards to its banking and financial sector. More than half of the Fortune 500 companies do business in Charlotte. Charlotte is home to 145 public schools and nearly 50 public schools. Nearly 70,000 students are enrolled in one of the 17 colleges in Charlotte. Charlotte is renown for being the home of many NASCAR race teams. Charlotte is conveniently located two hours from the Smokies, and is only three hours away from one of the many Carolina beaches.
